social.ogTitle: Muhammad Salman - Senior Mobile Applications Engineer
social.ogDescription: 5+ years of experience in Android | Built apps with 10M+ downloads | Expert in Kotlin, Java, Jetpack Compose, Firebase

sections.title: Professional Summary
sections.content: Senior Mobile Applications Engineer with 5+ years of experience architecting and delivering scalable Android apps (10M+ downloads). Proficient in Kotlin, Java, Jetpack Compose, and Firebase, with expertise in performance optimization, Jenkins CI/CD pipelines, and modern Android frameworks. Proven leader in driving architectural enhancements, accelerating delivery, and building high-performing teams, with Compose Multiplatform as a secondary skill for cross-platform development.

achievements: Implemented architectural improvements that enhanced engineering velocity.
Led end-to-end feature development ensuring consistent, timely product releases
Collaborated cross-functionally with product teams to deliver user-centric solutions
Successfully migrated legacy Java application to Kotlin
Enhanced app architecture with Room database and MVVM pattern for offline capabilities

items.name: Smart Transfer
items.description: Smart Transfer is a high-performance file sharing app with 10M+ downloads. It enables fast data transfer via Wi-Fi and hotspot, phone cloning, and internet-based sharing, while also offering productivity tools like bookmarks, storage and contacts clutter manager, and device stats (Wi-Fi and battery)

items.name: UNATION Events
items.description: Location-based event discovery platform with advanced geofencing, MVVM architecture, REST API integration, and Kotlin Coroutines

items.name: Logo Maker Pro
items.description: Creative design tool with 10M+ downloads, featuring Canvas drawing engine and AWS cloud integration for professional logo creation

items.name: Additional Portfolio
items.description: Plagiarism Checker • PDF Converter • Thumbnail Maker • Grammar Checker

items.degree: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology (BSIT)
